climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbon Neutral Certified by SCS Global Services means the product’s carbon emissions have been measured and reduced, with any remaining emissions offset.

features: This computer mouse offers the control to do more, faster : Flipping through photo albums and Web pages is a breeze, especially for right-handers – with three standard buttons plus Back/Forward buttons that you can also program to switch applications, go full screen and more; And side-to-side scrolling plus zoom gives you the power to scroll horizontally and vertically through your music library, maps and Facebook feeds, and zoom in and out of photos and budget spreadsheets with a click** Requires Logitech SetPoint software (Windows) or Logitech Control Center software (Mac OS X), available for download
Note : In case of Wireless mouse, the USB receiver will be provided inside or along with the mouse

Tiny Logitech Unifying USB receiver : Stays in your computer or laptop; There’s no need to unplug it when you move around, so there’s less worry of losing it; And you can easily add compatible wireless mice and keyboards to the same wireless receiver

Two years of battery life : Practically eliminates the need to the replace batteries of this wireless mouse**; The On/Off switch helps conserve power, smart sleep mode extends battery life and an indicator light eliminates surprises;** Battery life may vary based on user and computing conditions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My old Logitech M510 finally died after a long and happy life so it was time to replace it.I tried a few others but in the end, I ordered a new M510 as I was used to the function and feel.Super easy to installFor me, it's a very functional and comfortable mouseThe cost was cheaper than getting it from a local store and as an added bonus, got same day delivery using Prime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't miss with a Logitech. It is the real deal for quality.
reviews.reviewText: There are tons of choices for mice but I use one hours and hours each day. I did wear out my last Logitech but did not hesitate for a second - paying a little more for another genuine Logitech mouse. You can just feel the weight and the quality difference. This is one thing I will not scrimp on, and I am glad I got the "real deal". This model has the button by your right thumb which is easy to use and effective. It seems like it is almost an extension of my right hand and I will use no other if I can get this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive, good size for my hand, exactly enough buttons.
reviews.reviewText: I love this mouse. I think it hits the sweet spot in all areas: price, layout, size, looks. Simple, no nonsense, has everything I need and nothing I don't.I've been using this model for years. I just replaced my old one because the scroll wheel finally got too finicky. The rubber/plastic had worn down enough to cause major problems, but I'm pretty sure I used it for 10+ years.Beyond basic use, I use this mouse for gaming. I'm a casual but frequent gamer. If you're serious about your gaming, this may not be suitable re: response time or whatever, but I've never noticed anything. It has the perfect number and layout of buttons for FPS. Thumb buttons are out of the way when I don't need them, but easily accessible when I do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for an full size ergonomic mouse that could be paired with multiple devices. This one has the unify receiver and works perfect across my laptop, desktop and even my fire stick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have this mouse at work so I bought one for my son at home. It is a great mouse and very convenient to have a two-year battery life. There is also an easy to read on-off switch with red/green markings so you know when it is on or off. That feature is very good if you travel with your laptop and need to turn off the mouse, like I do going to and from work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I have had this mouse for years and love it
reviews.reviewText: The 510 mouse by Logitech is great.I've had one for years and never any trouble until I dropped it and the left switch broke. Its the ne I use to lower the music sound level. And I would like to ad a word about how Amazon handled my problem with the new one. I ordered a new 510 and it was supposed to have a unifying dongle with it. Well it didn't, some one had cut the package open and left the mouse but took the dongle. Of course I told Amazon about it and they replaced it no questions asked in just 2 weeks, Kudos Amazon! Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice size mouse & works great!
reviews.reviewText: My mouse at work was same one. Bought one for home & a replacement for work! Love the comfort & speed of the mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Simple set up, just plug in.
Maus gut zu handhaben und leicht zu bedienen
Fairly happy with. Not blown away though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: After 15 months of use - this has been one of the most brilliant purchases for lockdown
reviews.reviewText: I have fairly large hands and was looking for a simple mouse without a million buttons or lights or a rocket attached.The size and weight is perfect for my hands and I have had this plugged into my main desktop and have used it over a year (since March 2020 and this is written May 2021) for several hours every single day without a single issue.Tracking is super accurate, smooth. The buttons click still like day 1. The roller wheel has a very nice clicky yet smooth-ish action which is perfect for scrolling. The two side buttons I dont use much and wish I could get one without but they have stayed out of the way. The lettering is fading gently with use and thats the only indicator the mouse is over a year old - usage wise I don't notice any degradation. The original battery is still in use and I have never switched it off.Ergonomics wise I have had zero issues and I use it these days with a mousepad that has a gel wrist support as I needed one for a keyboard and this came with it but it tracks otherwise on any surface.There has been zero lag noticeable (i am not a gamer) and the movement across my 27inch high-res screen has been perfect for my needs.At £25 its not cheap when you can get a bluetooth mouse for under £15 (I have a review of a microsoft mouse that my kids use) but when you need something for long term use and want something that fits slightly large adult hands - this is a perfect device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on April 2, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Zeer goede muis, licht heel goed onder de hand. Ook antislip. Muis reageert op pc zoals het moet.

Sans fil, je ne peux plus m'en passer pour mon ordinateur de bureau. Assez grosse (souvent trop petites pour ma main), très bien en main, les différents boutons tombent naturellement sous les doigts. J'utilise un tapis de souris noir, donc je ne sais pas ce que ça peut donner sur une autre surface. Les clics s'entendent mais ne dérangent pas.J'ai acheté celle-ci pour remplacer le même modèle dont la molette ne fonctionnait plus bien. Mais après 5 ans d'utilisation intensive (plusieurs heures par jour en navigation et jeux), c'est le seul problème que j'ai eu ! De plus, je la trouve économe en piles, même si parfois j'ai oublié de l'éteindre en même temps que le PC. Je suis fan de Logitech depuis 25 ans et je n'ai jamais été déçu (souris, clavier, casque et haut-parleurs) Pour moi, un rapport qualité/prix imbattable.
